group_1.textRight: I believe Ui's journal would be valuable as@qualitative data.
With this, we'll be able to reach a deeper layer of insight.

group_1.textLeft: That's an overstatement for something like this.

group_1.textRight: Kufufu, for a genius of my caliber...
there's more than enough to get the ideas flowing!
The present conclusion from our investigation a few days ago is...
userName is a being possessing sociality.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's what you said, although I don't get what sociality is...
The point is, it's a disposition towards building relationships with acquaintances, friends, and@family.

group_1.textRight: Looking at Ui's journal,
you can also see just how predominant this@disposition is...
But this alone doesn't explain everything.

group_1.textLeft: Rather than it having strong intentions,
I'd say it feels a purpose of sorts.
Can't its goal be to get along with everyone?

group_1.textRight: ...Picture this.
You have loving family members, the best of friends,
and also acquaintances you occasionally hang out with...
In that kind of scenario, would you deliberately go@up to people who dislike you?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... Becoming friends with those sorts of people would be wonderful...

group_1.textRight: But normally you wouldn't go without a clear@purpose right, nyaa?
The investigation afterwards established
that it has attempted to approach practically all of@the magical girls in Kamihama.

group_1.narration: It has family,
has acquaintances and friends,
yet it still goes to see those who regard it coldly.

group_1.textRight: This point makes me feel its powerful sense of@purpose.
...We're stuck because we haven't figured that out!
It's probably not to create offspring...
The probability of it having been affected due to@being a container for Ui's soul is also low.
Could it be a hidden Incubator disposition, nyaa...?

group_1.textCenter: Oh, welcome, the two of you.

group_1.textRight: Ah, Onee-sama! As a matter of fact...

group_1.narration: ―Iroha―@Mm, userName's purpose...
―userName―@Mokyuu...?
―Nemu―@I personally would endorse the theory it's trying to mimic humans.
―Ui―@Mimic?
―Nemu―@Yeah, instead of its actions being biologically-driven...
―Nemu―@I think it's more accurate to say they present as being human-like.
―Nemu―@It's deepening its understanding of emotions and the energy@therein through imitating humans, mingling with people...
―Nemu―@Given the current information, isn't that what we can infer?
―Touka―@Really? I don't think userName can formulate something like that.
―userName―@Mokyu...!?
―Touka―@I'd think it's simply reinforcement learning based on Ui's actions.
―Touka―@Its original form is that of an emotionless Incubator,@so just like an AI, right?
―Ui―@Hmm... This is too complicated, I can't follow...
―Ui―@What do you think, Onee-chan?
―Iroha―@Hmm... userName's purpose... It's just a feeling...
―Iroha―@but I think userName's most likely doing these things for our benefit.
―Nemu―@You're saying that as a social animal, it's trying to act for@its group's benefit...?
―Touka―@Or something like it does things for Onee-sama's sake,@having been affected while being a container for Ui's soul?
―Iroha―@U-Uh... I don't know what the complicated explanation would be...
―Iroha―@but I feel like userName is supporting us however it can,
―Iroha―@in order to cheer on our efforts to free all magical girls@from witchification.

group_1.textRight: [chara:810100:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Mokyu!
Mokyuu?

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank you for accompanying us until now.

group_1.textRight: Kyu, mokkyuu!

group_1.textLeft: Fufu, that's right, we'll be together from here on@out too.

group_1.textRight: Mokyuuu!

group_1.textCenter: At this point it's Mikazuki Villa's mascot.
